page.title: 16Recreation (1), Bowness.
page.content: {Fishing}is a very popular activity, especially{char}fishing in{Lake {Windermere.}The nearest relative to the{char}is the{trout.} { {Fell Races}or{Guide Races}have been popular here for hundreds of years. The race, to the top of the nearest fell and back, demands tremendous physical fitness and stamina. { {Fell Running}is similar to the{Guide {Races}except that the distance may be over 20 miles and many fell tops. { {Fell Walking}is becoming so popular that many paths and fell tops are becoming badly{eroded.}
